issue.title: Rename FluoConfiguration properties
issue.body:
For #842, the properties in FluoConfiguration should be renamed to reflect in the new names in `connection.properties` and `application.properties` of the new downstream Fluo launch repos:

* [fluo-local](https://github.com/mikewalch/fluo-local/tree/master/conf)
* [fluo-yarn](https://github.com/mikewalch/fluo-yarn/tree/master/distribution/conf)

issue.title: Support loading FluoConfiguration from multiple files
issue.body: For #842, downstream repos that run Fluo split `fluo.properties` into `connection.properties` and `application.properties`. `FluoConfiguration` should support loading multiple configuration files.

issue.title: Create FluoInit command
issue.body:
For #842, a initialization main method needs to be created that accept configuration files and initializes the application.  
```
java org.apache.fluo.core.command.FluoInit /path/to/connection.properties /path/to/application.properties
```

Initialization should also stored configuration in Zookeeper so it can be retrieved later.  Application jars should also be loaded to HDFS.

issue.title: Retrieve FluoConfiguration from Zookeeper using app name & connection.properties
issue.body: For #842, the API needs to be improved so that if a Fluo application was previously initialized, it's FluoConfiguration can be built by simply having connection.properties to Fluo instance and the application name.

issue.title: Create FluoGetJars command
issue.body:
For #842, the jars for Fluo application are loaded to HDFS during initialization.  There needs to command to retrieves these jars and copy them to local directory.

```
java org.apache.fluo.core.command.FluoGetJars /path/to/connection.properties myAppName /path/to/download/jars
```

issue.title: Create FluoOracle command
issue.body:
For #842, create command that runs Oracle if given connection.properties and the application name.
```
java org.apache.fluo.core.command.FluoOracle /path/to/connection.properties myAppName
```

issue.title: Create FluoWorker command
issue.body:
For #842, create command that runs Worker if given connection.properties and the application name.
```
java org.apache.fluo.core.command.FluoWorker /path/to/connection.properties myAppName
```

issue.title: Create FluoScan command
issue.body:
For #842, create command that scans Fluo if given connection.properties and the application name.
```
java org.apache.fluo.core.command.FluoScan /path/to/connection.properties myAppName
```

issue.title: Create FluoList command
issue.body:
For #842, create command that lists Fluo applications if given connection.properties.

```
java org.apache.fluo.core.command.FluoScan /path/to/connection.properties
```

issue.title: Create FluoWait command
issue.body:
For #842, create command that waits for all notifications for a Fluo application to be processed if given connection.properties and the application name.
```
java org.apache.fluo.core.command.FluoWait /path/to/connection.properties myAppName
```

issue.title: Create FluoYarnLauncher
issue.body:
For #842, This class should be created in "fluo-yarn" repo to launch a Fluo application in YARN using Twill.
```
java org.apache.fluo.yarn.FluoYarnLauncher /path/to/connection.properties myAppName /path/to/my/app/lib
```
